channel.title: CVE Feed for codersaiful -- Sheet to Table Live Sync for Google Sheet
channel.description: The latest CVEs for codersaiful -- Sheet to Table Live Sync for Google Sheet

item.title: CVE-2024-6532|2024-08-14T13:07:55.074Z -- codersaiful -- sheet%20to%20table%20live%20sync%20for%20google%20sheet
item.description: The Sheet to Table Live Sync for Google Sheet plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's STWT_Sheet_Table shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-6532|2024-08-14T09:29:59.268Z -- codersaiful -- sheet%20to%20table%20live%20sync%20for%20google%20sheet
item.description: The Sheet to Table Live Sync for Google Sheet plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's STWT_Sheet_Table shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
